Hi Sebastian,

If you're anyway willing to consider special syntax (as in y=
our example, where '!' indicates negation), then you might as well go one s=
tep further and allow arbitrary propositional expressions, including disjun=
ction, conjunction and grouping (i.e. use of parentheses). At the very leas=
t, using @GroupFilter allows you to keep that option open as a future exten=
sion.

Cheers,
Stephan
